Title: Establishes the sustainable affordable housing incentive program
Summary: Establishes the sustainable affordable housing incentive program to provide assistance in the form of payments, grants and loans for reasonable and necessary expenses to an eligible applicant for sustainable housing activities; defines terms.
LawCode: Add Art 31 §§1280 - 1282, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to establishing the sustainable affordable housing incentive program
